tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE remote_team_communication (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE team_communication (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE team_collaboration (
    collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT,
    project_id INT,
    collaboration_type VARCHAR(50),
    collaboration_description TEXT,
    collaboration_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_text TEXT,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE collaborations (
    collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collaboration_name VARCHAR(100),
    participants VARCHAR(255),
    collaboration_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE collaboration_history (
    collab_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    team_member_id INT,
    collaboration_type TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
